Name: Levantine Arabic QT Training Data Set 4 (Speech + Transcripts)
Description: Levantine Arabic QT Training Data Set 4 (Speech + Transcripts) was developed by the Linguistic Data Consortium (LDC) and contains approximately 138 hours of conversational telephone speech in Levantine Arabic and the associated transcripts.
Authors: Mohamed Maamouri, Tim Buckwalter, Hubert Jin
